Posts.Content: Hi, I have recently been diagnosed with breast cancer.  It is grade 3 NST, I’m off to hospital tomorrow for an echo and then back Thursday for 3 appointments1 is an mri and 2 are in oncology.  I’m hoping that when I sign the paperwork Thursday that I will then know rough dates for my chemo.  I haven’t really cried since they told me they suspected it was cancer, which was over 2 weeks ago. I didn’t cry when they told me for certain it was cancer.  I am unsure how I feel in all honesty.  I am a happy bubbly person who is always smiling. I know I am not alone, I have friends and family but sometimes you need someone from the outside to talk to
Posts.Title: Someone to talk to
